criteria: Understanding of words and phrases related to daily topics.
Use of orthography, phonology, ASL parameters, and sentence-level elements.
Ability to form simple sentences on familiar topics.
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of words or phrases related to familiar daily topics.
Demonstrates very limited understanding; struggles to recognize even basic words and phrases.
Demonstrates some understanding of isolated words and phrases but struggles to connect them in a meaningful way.
Demonstrates adequate understanding of common words and phrases but may misinterpret or misuse them occasionally.
Demonstrates good understanding of words and phrases, using them appropriately in most contexts.
Demonstrates excellent understanding of a wide range of words and phrases related to daily topics, using them accurately and effectively.
Shows no evidence of using orthography, phonology, ASL parameters, or sentence-level elements.
Attempts to use these elements, but with frequent and significant errors that impede communication.
Uses these elements inconsistently, with errors that occasionally confuse the meaning.
Uses these elements adequately, with some errors that do not significantly impede communication.
Uses these elements well, with only minor errors that do not affect understanding.
Uses these elements skillfully and accurately to enhance communication.
Unable to form simple sentences on familiar topics.
Forms sentences that are incomprehensible or grammatically incorrect.
Forms very basic sentences with significant grammatical errors that often obscure the meaning.
Forms simple sentences with some grammatical errors, but the meaning is generally clear.
Forms grammatically correct simple sentences on familiar topics.
Forms complex and grammatically sound sentences, using a varied vocabulary and demonstrating nuanced understanding.
Unable to communicate any meaningful information.
Communication is severely limited and difficult to understand.
Can communicate some basic information, but with significant effort and frequent misunderstandings.
Communicates adequately on familiar topics, but may struggle with more complex ideas or unfamiliar vocabulary.
Communicates effectively on a range of familiar topics, demonstrating a clear understanding.
Communicates fluently and effectively, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of the language and culture.
